short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture web content into NOTE<GO> on the Bloomberg Terminal

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture images, ideas and information, tag them to specific securities or themes and share with your network via NOTE <GO> on the Bloomberg Terminal.

• Create Bloomberg notes from a screenshot of whatever web page you are on.
• Indicate the note title, content and Bloomberg tags.
• Share notes with selected communities or individual users.
• Annotate screenshots with a digital highlighter pen.
• Add text boxes.
• Once a note is created it is viewable via NOTE<GO> on the Terminal.
